hero.title:
Professional Consumer

psychology strategist
hero.subtitle: Nathaly Hellström
hero.description:
I am a Consumer Psychology & Storytelling Strategist based in Stockholm, passionate about crafting meaningful brand experiences through UX design, consumer psychology, and content creation. With ten years of experience in customer care and four years in UX and marketing strategy, I specialise in transforming client ideas into engaging, results-driven solutions.



My career began in the aviation industry, where I spent seven years as a flight attendant and three years as a cabin chief with Avianca Colombia. This role provided me with a profound understanding of customer service, human behaviour, and the importance of delivering outstanding user experiences.



Driven by a desire for new challenges, I relocated to Sweden six years ago, broadening my expertise in digital marketing, UX research, content strategy, and storytelling. Since 2021, I have been leading Vad händer i Sverige, a marketing and events agency, where I merge creativity with strategic thinking to build impactful digital narratives and unforgettable brand experiences.



At Vad händer i Sverige, I have had the privilege of working closely with clients to lead marketing strategies and deliver high-impact campaigns. These initiatives have not only elevated brand presence but also generated millions of euros in sales—demonstrating the power of strategic storytelling and UX in driving business success.



I am currently in my eighth semester of a Psychology degree, specialising in consumer psychology. My academic background provides me with deep insights into human behaviour, decision-making processes, and emotional triggers, which I apply strategically to UX design, marketing, and brand positioning.



Fluent in Spanish, English, and Swedish, I am able to navigate multicultural environments and build strong connections across diverse markets and industries. My passion for music, photography, and creativity is reflected in every project I undertake.



I am always seeking new challenges and opportunities to innovate, create, and connect.

hero.title: Contact
hero.subtitle: Every brand has a story waiting to be told—I bring it to life.
hero.description:
Whether you are looking to refine your brand's message, enhance user experience, or craft powerful marketing strategies that truly connect and convert, I would love to hear your vision.

Let's turn ideas into impactful experiences that inspire, engage, and deliver results. Send me a message, and let's create something extraordinary together!

timeline.title: Avianca – Flight Attendant / Cabin Purser
timeline.text:
Four years as National Cabin Purser and International Flight Attendant.
Recognised for academic excellence in safety procedures and customer service.
Developed strong skills in leadership, crisis management, and premium guest experience.

Delivered high-end service in the VIP section at Friends Arena, catering to distinguished guests.
Strengthened expertise in hospitality, attention to detail, and customer engagement.

timeline.text: Assisted Medicare users with efficiency and empathy; excelled in user support systems, problem-solving, and customer relations.

timeline.title: GUGO & Vad händer i Sverige – Consumer Psych Strategist
timeline.text: Led UX, storytelling, and consumer-psychology-driven marketing campaigns, generating millions in client sales. Expert in content strategy and brand experience optimisation.
